Package game.core

Class GameEnvironment

java.lang.Object
game.core.GameEnvironment
public class GameEnvironment extends Object
The GameEnvironment class represents the game environment and manages various game-related functionalities. It includes features such as team management, market, enemy teams, player updates, purchases, points calculation, and random events.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    GameEnvironment()
    Constructs a new GameEnvironment object and initializes the game environment.

  • Constructor Details

    • GameEnvironment

      public GameEnvironment()
      Constructs a new GameEnvironment object and initializes the game environment. It generates the market team, market items, and enemy teams based on the player's current week.

    • purchase

      public boolean purchase(Athlete selectedAthlete, int athletePrice, String selectedTeam)
      Handles the purchase of an athlete from the market.
      Parameters:
      selectedAthlete - The athlete to be purchased.
      athletePrice - The price of the athlete.
      selectedTeam - The target team (Main or Reserve).
      Returns:
      True if the purchase is successful, false otherwise.

    • getRandomEvent

      public String getRandomEvent()
      Generates a random event and returns the result. Random events can include players joining the team, stat boosts, or players quitting the team.
      Returns:
      The result of the random event.
